name: PKPaymentSummaryItem
desc: An object that defines a summary item in a payment request—for example, total, tax, discount, or grand total.

items.name: init(label: String, amount: NSDecimalNumber)
items.desc: Initializes and returns a summary item with the given label and amount.

items.name: init(label: String, amount: NSDecimalNumber, type: PKPaymentSummaryItemType)
items.desc: Initializes and returns a summary item with the given label, amount, and type.

items.name: var label: String
items.desc: A short, localized description of the item.

items.name: var type: PKPaymentSummaryItemType
items.desc: The summary item’s type indicating whether or not the amount is final.

items.name: enum PKPaymentSummaryItemType
items.desc: Constants that describe the type of the payment summary item, such as final or pending.
